H0.text: Which band released a 1999 album entitled ‘The Man Who’. Coldplay

H3.text: Which band released a 1999 album entitled ‘The Man Who’. Travis

A4.text: Travis' second album, 1999's The Man Who, was produced by Nigel Godrich
